pkgmetadata.longdescription: Differential Expression Enrichment Tool // A bio informatics R package for comparing a list of human genes to published RNA- Seq studies containing similar DE genes. Reference: Sokolowski,D.J., Ahn J., Erdman,L., Hou,H., Wang L., Goldenberg,A., and Wilson,M.D. (2022) Differential Expression Enrichment Tool (DEET): An interactive atlas of human differential gene expression. (In Preparation).
